009package imagingbook.common.morphology;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.morphology.StructuringElements.makeBoxKernel3x3;
012
013/**
014 * This is the (abstract) super-class for binary morphological filters.
015 * 
016 * @author WB
017 * @version 2022/09/18
018 */
019public abstract class BinaryMorphologyFilter implements BinaryMorphologyOperator {
020        
021        final byte[][] H; // structuring element (used by implementing classes)
022        
023        // ---- constructors --------------------------------------------------------
024
025        BinaryMorphologyFilter() {
026                this(makeBoxKernel3x3());
027        }
028        
029        BinaryMorphologyFilter(byte[][] H) {
030                this.H = H;
031        }
032        
033        // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
034
035        /**
036         * Returns the structuring element (kernel H) for this morphological filter. Note that the structuring element is a
037         * 2D {@code byte} array structured in the form {@code H[y][x]}. A reference to the internal array is returned,
038         * i.e., no copy is made.
039         *
040         * @return the structuring element
041         */
042        public byte[][] getStructuringElement() {
043                return this.H;
044        }
045
046}
047
